metadata.title: LovinPet Dog Bodysuits, Post Operative Jumpsuit for Dogs Apparel, Reflective Strap Full Coverage Dog Onesie, Breathable & Elastic Dinosaur Jungle Blue Prints Pajamas for Big Dogs XXL
features: WHICH ARE THE SUITABLE BREEDS: LovinPet dog onesie designed for Medium/ Large Dogs, such as Pitbull/American Bulldog/Boxer/German Shepherds/Labrador/Labs/Husky/Border Collie /Rottweiler Mix And Other Large Breeds.

WORN IN ALL SEASONS: The dog t-shirt can be use in all seasons, UV protection in summer& keep warm in winter, especially at night when the temperature is low during the day, wearing it can make the dog feel warm and maintain the quality of his/her sleep.

AS A BOTTOMING SHIRT: The large dog onesie is soft&lightweight with great elasticity. Very suitable for close-fitting. It can be worn alone in summer, or used as a bottoming under coats in winter. Your doggy will love this comfy clothing.

HIGH COLLAR REFLECTIVE BELT DESIGN: This is a high collar neck with reflective belt dinosaur jungle blue prints design, and reflective fabrics are used on the hind legs to make it easy to find your dog when walking at night, the version fits the dog's body curve.
HIGH QUALITY SHOPPING SERVICE: We support no-reasons replacement service. Any questions with our pjs, please feel free to contact us., we would try our best to help you solve the issue ASAP.
description: is specializing in the area of big dog pajamas, we are also trying our best to support animal shelters. We do understand dogs are an important part of the family, so help the owner love in their dogs in a better way. Our clothes not only look good but also very practical, We believe our quality will beyond your expectations.
: LovinPet dog pajamas designed for Medium/ Large Dogs, such as Pitbull/American Bulldog/Beagle/German Shepherds/Labrador/Labs/Husky/Border Collie /Rottweiler Mix And Other Large Breeds.

: The dog pjs can be use in all seasons, UV protection in summer& keep warm in winter, especially at night when the temperature is low during the day, wearing it can make the dog feel warm and maintain the quality of his/her sleep.

: The dog long sleeve shirt is soft&lightweight with great elasticity. Very suitable for close-fitting. It can be worn alone in summer, or used as a bottoming under coats in winter. Your doggy will love this comfy clothing.

: This is a high collar neck with a reflective belt dinosaur jungle blue prints design, and reflective fabrics are used on the hind legs to make it easy to find your dog when walking at night, the version fits the dog's body curve.
Warm Tips About Choosing the Right Size For Your Furry Baby
Please measure the bust and neck length. Bust is the most important. The bust is the widest part of the chest. Please consider the 0.5 inch error.
Please measure the bust and neck length. Bust is the most important. The bust is the widest part of the chest. Please consider the 0.5 inch error.

The data on the size chart are only general sizes. Different dogs have different body shapes, and the actual effect of putting them on the body will be slightly different. Please choose the size that suits your dog according to the size chart.
